summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3346, for the improvement of Northlake Avenue and East Northlake Avenue, from West margin of Stone Way to East margin of Pasadena Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41306 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
